title: Project creation should confirm the ability to delete and rebuild the bin directory
OB: When a user creates a new project for an existing directory structure, we should display a confirmation message to ensure that the output directory (bin) can be deleted and then rebuilt. Some users are creating projects and pointing the output folder at a bin directory which contains more than just .class files that can be rebuilt from the available .java files.
EB: When creating a new project, a confirmation message should be displayed to confirm that the bin directory can be scrubbed (deleted and rebuilt).
